title: Vaccine Equity Model
text: models behavior population two distinct sub-populations interact differentially within-group across group rates different rates vaccine adherence.

text: Install package github using devtools package, run Shiny application run_my_app() function.

title: main calculation — getFinalSize
code: getFinalSize(   vacTime,   vacPortion,   popSize,   R0,   recoveryRate,   contactRatio,   contactWithinGroup,   suscRatio )

title: main calculation — getFinalSize
text: vacTime time first case vaccinations delivered vacPortion fraction population vaccinated popSize size population R0 overall basic reproduction number recoveryRate inverse mean infectious period (time units vacTime) contactRatio ratio 2nd group's : 1st group's overall contact rate contactWithinGroup fraction group's contacts -group vs -group suscRatio ratio 2nd group's : 1st group's susceptibility infection per contact

title: Runs the shiny app — run_my_app
text: Starts execution app, printing port console.

title: Runs the shiny app — run_my_app
text: app featured package one presented shiny demo: https://shiny.posit.co/r/getstarted/shiny-basics/lesson1/index.html.

title: Runs the shiny app — run_my_app
code: # To be executed interactively only if (interactive()) {   run_my_app() }
